```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(chilemaps)

regions_map_2 <- regions_map %>% 
  do.call(rbind, .)


nombres <-  regions_map_2 %>% 
  left_join(
    territorial_codes %>% select(region_id,commune_name) %>% distinct() 
  ) %>%  filter(commune_name %in% c("Coquimbo", "Santiago", "Los Angeles"))

vector_nombres <- territorial_codes %>% select(commune_name) %>% distinct() %>% 
  filter(str_detect(tolower(commune_name),"conc"))

ggplot(regions_map_2) +
  geom_sf(fill= "white")+
  geom_sf_label(data = nombres , aes(label = commune_name))


nombres <-  regions_map_2 %>% 
  left_join(
    territorial_codes %>% select(region_id,commune_name) %>% distinct() 
  ) %>%  filter(commune_name %in% c("Coquimbo", "Santiago", "Los Angeles"))




```
